tagline.en: Modern smart home control interface based on React, perfectly integrated with Home Assistant
tagline.zh: 基于React的现代化智能家居控制界面，完美集成Home Assistant

details.en: Perfect support for mobile and desktop, control your smart home anytime, anywhere
details.zh: 完美支持移动端和桌面端，随时随地控制您的智能家居

details.en: Support for drag-and-drop layout, card management, theme switching and more personalization options
details.zh: 支持自由拖拽布局、卡片管理、主题切换等多种个性化配置

details.en: Support PWA installation to desktop, providing near-native app experience
details.zh: 支持PWA安装到桌面，提供接近原生应用的体验

details.en: Support for control and monitoring of various smart devices including lights, AC, curtains, sensors, cameras
details.zh: 支持灯光、空调、窗帘、传感器、摄像头等多种智能设备的控制和监控

details.en: Support Docker deployment and Home Assistant plugin installation for quick start
details.zh: 支持Docker部署和Home Assistant插件方式安装，快速上手无障碍

details.en: Based on Home Assistant's Websocket API, ensuring real-time device status synchronization
details.zh: 基于Home Assistant的Websocket API，确保设备状态实时同步
